Ah, I was not expecting such... esteemed guests; 
no matter, I shall make time. 
I, Heroic King Mithradates, sixth of my name, welcomes you to Pontus
...
You haven't heard of my exalted bloodline? 
Sorry did you say you were Persian or Greek?
neutralHello: What might the humble Mithridates do for you, friend...?

Oh my Gods... 
I'm speechless. Absolutely dumbfounded. 
What could drive so many foreign peoples 
to butcher their friends, neighbors, countrymen, just for 
speaking the tongue of your people? 
I'm sorry, I'm beyond words, truly. We've had a 
couple squabbles in the past, but 
you must've recognized mindless 
barbarity as this is something I 
could never abide. And by those pretending they were your allies 
o less, I don't even feel like I 
know this land anymore. I 
promise I'll do what's in my 
power to see these debased massacres end at

My deepest condolences.
